# About

This repo is home to exploratory data analysis tied to sea level rise resources. 

## Preliminary Objectives

 * Set scheduled scripts to harvest tide/weather patterns to keep an app always up to date.
 * Build infrastructure to return personalized forecasts for sunny-day flood events.
